entry.title: Cross-Chain Solutions and the Critical Role of Node Infrastructure
entry.content: The blockchain world is expanding at lightning speed, but every network often operates like a standalone island, limiting the reach and utility of decentralised finance (DeFi), gaming, NFTs, and other Web3 applications. Cross-chain technologies aim to break down these barriers by connecting diverse blockchains into an integrated ecosystem.How Do Cross-Chain Technologies Work?Cross-chain solutions unify separate blockchains so that assets and data can move freely among them. Here are the major mechanisms:1. BridgesBridges establish direct pathways between blockchains, allowing users to transfer assets with minimal friction. In addition to well-known bridging protocols like Wormhole and Multichain, THORChain leverages trust-minimised cross-chain liquidity pools, enabling native swaps between different networks.2. Atomic SwapsAtomic swaps enable a trustless exchange of assets across blockchains — no third-party custodians required.3. Sidechains and ParachainsNetworks such as Polkadot and Cosmos rely on sidechains or parachains to offload work from the main chain, enhancing scalability and cross-network connectivity. Our partner Self Chain, has recently integrated CosmWasm into its Layer 1 infrastructure, enabling developers to deploy smart contracts that are interoperable across Cosmos-based ecosystems. This opens the door to cross-chain applications, DAOs, and DeFi protocols that can interact natively with other IBC-compatible chains — solidifying Self Chain’s role in the growing cross-chain ecosystem.4. Interoperability ProtocolsInteroperability protocols set universal standards for data and asset movement, enabling multiple blockchains to operate in harmony. Our long-term partner POKT Network provides decentralised RPC endpoints for simpler cross-chain development, while Pyth Network delivers real-world market data to various blockchains. By offering these core services, both POKT and Pyth help different networks operate in unison, expanding the utility of cross-chain solutions.As businesses and developers realise the benefits, many blockchains are actively integrating these solutions, enhancing network utility and user experience.What Business Problems Do Cross-Chain Technologies Solve?1. Global Finance and PaymentsCross-chain solutions streamline cross-border payments, making them faster and more cost-effective — vital for institutions moving substantial sums across multiple digital-asset networks.2. DeFi and LiquidityBy linking different ecosystems, cross-chain protocols let DeFi projects tap into liquidity from various blockchains. This not only accelerates growth but also makes services more accessible to a broader user base.3. Gaming and NFTsCross-chain technology lets gamers or NFT collectors move assets across diverse virtual worlds, creating richer gaming environments and uniting once-siloed NFT platforms. DeFi Kingdoms has its own bridging mechanisms to move tokens and NFTs across multiple chains, ensuring smooth multi-chain gameplay and DeFi integrations.4. Corporate IntegrationEnterprises often juggle multiple blockchains for tasks like supply chain management and data synchronization. Cross-chain tech unifies these processes, saving time and reducing administrative complexity.The Role of Node Providers in the Cross-Chain EcosystemCross-chain solutions thrive on reliable node infrastructure. However, setting up and managing nodes across various networks can be time-consuming, expensive, and technically complex. Many companies lack the resources to operate their own full nodes for each blockchain they wish to support.That’s where Liquify comes in. We specialise in providing enterprise-grade node infrastructure, serving over 90+ blockchain networks. Liquify’s global coverage means businesses can harness cross-chain technologies without the burden of building and maintaining in-house node operations.Why Liquify?Bare Metal Infrastructure: Liquify runs dedicated servers in 6 global locations — USA (East and West), UK, Germany, Japan, and Singapore — removing virtualisation overhead and guaranteeing consistently high performance for even the most demanding Web3 applications. This approach achieves 40–80% better cost efficiency than typical cloud solutions.High Throughput: Liquify is optimised to handle billions of daily RPC calls, ensuring a frictionless experience even during peak network demand.Lower Latency: Strategic data centre placements enable rapid data transfers, critical for applications requiring near real-time cross-chain interactions.Scalability and Reliability: Our globally distributed infrastructure offers 99.99% uptime, meeting the standards needed for mission-critical blockchain applications.Dedicated Support: From proof-of-concept to large-scale deployment, Liquify’s team of experts assists at every step, making cross-chain integration simpler and more cost-effective.Start small with our free plan (includes up to 50,000 daily requests), or choose a higher tier for more demanding applications. Visit our Liquify Portal to sign up, explore options, and scale as your project grows. Whether you’re building DeFi services, cross-chain games, or enterprise-grade solutions, Liquify’s node infrastructure and dedicated support make multi-chain integration easier than ever.ConclusionCross-chain technologies bridge the gaps between previously isolated blockchains, enabling faster, cheaper, and more versatile transactions. Whether it’s empowering cross-border payments, enhancing liquidity in DeFi, enabling seamless NFT transfers, or simplifying corporate data integration, these innovations redefine what’s possible in the crypto economy.If you’re aiming to take advantage of cross-chain solutions without handling node deployment and maintenance yourself, Liquify has you covered. Our blockchain-as-a-service platform provides secure, cost-efficient, and scalable node infrastructure for over 90+ networks, helping your business stay competitive in a rapidly evolving market.Ready to integrate cross-chain technologies into your operations? Visit Liquify Portal or Contact us today for a dedicated consultation and discover how our services can bring your multi-chain vision to life.Bookmark our blog, subscribe to our monthly newsletter and follow us on social media to stay informed about the latest news and developments in the Liquify ecosystem.

entry.title: Powering Blockchain Innovation: Liquify and Cido.ai Partnership
entry.content: Just as a library preserves humanity’s historical knowledge, Liquify’s RPC archival infrastructure will serve as the cornerstone for Cido’s data indexing, ensuring that every piece of information remains accessible and secure.IntroductionHistorical blockchain data is becoming increasingly valuable. Among its many uses, it’s the foundation upon which DeFi is built, with billions of dollars in value locked in smart contracts onchain. Liquify’s collaboration with Cido provides the critical RPC archival infrastructure ensuring blockchain history remains accessible and secure.Cido is a leader in blockchain indexing, capable of serving access to real-time data and fully syncing blockchains much faster than current solutions. Their platform enables developers to deploy and go live in seconds, offering unparalleled speed and efficiency. With the integration of Liquify’s battle-tested RPC archival infrastructure, Cido can enhance its product suite and continue its mission of making blockchain data accessible to all.Enhancing Blockchain InfrastructureIf blockchains are the highways of the digital economy, Liquify’s RPC archival nodes are the watchtowers, keeping meticulous records of every transaction. Our infrastructure is crucial for Cido, ensuring that their indexing technology operates at peak performance. Liquify’s RPC archival nodes act as time capsules, preserving the complete history of transactions and making this data readily available for Cido’s platform and its users.With Liquify’s robust infrastructure network, Cido gains access to a comprehensive historical archive, enabling them to deliver real-time data solutions with reliability and speed.What Makes Cido Unique?Cido stands out in the blockchain industry by providing an unmatched indexing solution that prioritizes speed and efficiency. Their on-demand indexing capability allows programmers to save time on iterating and development cycles, drastically reducing time-to-market. In addition, Cido has engineered its platform to outperform competitors by a staggering margin, leveraging advanced parallel data processing, bulk indexing, state caching, pre-computation, and functional algorithms. This means they can handle massive volumes of data in real time, far exceeding the performance of benchmark solutions.Moreover, Cido is designed to scale effortlessly as chains process more transactions and onchain data grows. The architecture not only adapts to increasing demands on the infrastructure, but does so at a much lower cost than competitors. This cost efficiency, combined with their comprehensive suite of data solutions — ranging from transactional data to smart contract interactions — ensures that developers have everything they need at their fingertips. Cido’s interoperable architecture allows seamless integration with standard blockchain nodes, empowering developers to access data without the complexities often associated with custom solutions.“Indexing infrastructure needs to evolve to serve a world of multiple, fast-moving blockchains and Cido delivers on that vision. Digital systems across the world are adopting blockchain architectures and as this second digital transformation continues, the demand for real-time indexing of that data will skyrocket. Our partnership with Liquify is an important step in that direction, combining Cido’s best-in-class indexing with Liquify’s Infrastructure as a Service model serving the world’s most important projects. Cido is positioned to serve that market and provide scalable, reliable and fast indexing when and where it’s needed most.”ConclusionAs blockchain technology continues to reshape our digital world, the importance of preserving and accessing its data becomes increasingly important. Through our partnership, Liquify is helping Cido unlock the full potential of blockchain data, transforming onchain history into a foundation for future innovation.About CidoCido is revolutionizing the way developers and enterprises interact with blockchain data. With its state-of-the-art “Proof of Truth” blockchain indexer, Cido delivers low query latency, high scalability, and unparalleled real-time data access across both EVM and non-EVM networks. Built to address critical challenges like network latency, RPC dependency, and inefficiency, Cido’s modular, chain-agnostic architecture is engineered for the high-throughput future demands of the Web3 ecosystem. From DeFi and gaming to AI, Cido ensures fast, reliable, and scalable access to onchain data — powering the next generation of decentralized applications.About LiquifyLiquify operates nodes on over 60 networks, providing fully bare-metal infrastructure as a service tailored for blockchain enterprises.
